description: Defines a REST controller for information endpoints in an authentication backend, providing simple application status and info messages.

classes.name: InfoController
classes.description: A REST controller providing basic info endpoints for health check and application info.

methods.name: root
methods.description: Handles GET requests to '/' and returns a welcome message indicating the app is running.

methods.name: info
methods.description: Handles GET requests to '/api/info' and returns application information including framework and security components.
